glsa.title: Qt: Buffer overflow in the included zlib library
glsa.synopsis: Qt is vulnerable to a buffer overflow which could potentially lead to the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: Qt is a cross-platform GUI toolkit used by KDE.

description.p: Qt links to a bundled vulnerable version of zlib when emerged with the zlib USE-flag disabled. This may lead to a buffer overflow.

impact.p: By creating a specially crafted compressed data stream, attackers can overwrite data structures for applications that use Qt, resulting in a Denial of Service or potentially arbitrary code execution.

workaround.p: Emerge Qt with the zlib USE-flag enabled.

resolution.p: All Qt users should upgrade to the latest version:
